summary: In order to trap some spies, the Bowery Boys join the Army.
cast: Leo Gorcey|Huntz Hall|Donald MacBride|Virginia Hewitt|Russell Hicks|Bernard Gorcey|William 'Billy' Benedict|Buddy Gorman|David Gorcey|John Bleifer|Al Eben|Frank Jenks|Selmer Jackson|William Bailey|Chet Brandenburg|Loren Brown|Ken DuMain|George Eldredge|Joe Gilbert|Roy Gordon|Ellen Hall|Patricia Hall|Copper Johnson|Harry Lauter|Rudy Lee|Diana Mumby|George Offerman Jr.|Michael Ross|William Ruhl|Emil Sitka|Lisa Wilson
title: Bowery Battalion
